Transesterification¶

class biosteam.units.Transesterification(ID='', ins=None, outs=(), *, efficiency, methanol2lipid, T, catalyst_molfrac)[source]¶

Create a transesterification reactor that converts ‘Lipid’ and ‘Methanol’ to ‘Biodiesel’ and ‘Glycerol’. Finds the amount of catalyst ‘NaOCH3’ required and consumes it to ‘NaOH’ and ‘Methanol’.

Parameters
ins

[0] Lipid feed

[1] Methanol feed (includes catalyst)

outs

[0] Product

efficiencyfloat

Efficiency of conversion (on a ‘Lipid’ basis)

methanol2lipidfloat

Methanol feed to lipid molar ratio

catalyst_molfracfloat

Catalyst to methanol molar ratio

Tfloat

Operating temperature (K)

reaction = None¶

[ParallelReaction] Transesterification and catalyst consumption reaction

T = None¶

Operation temperature (K).

property tau¶

Residence time (hr).

property efficiency¶

Transesterification efficiency.

property methanol2lipid¶

Methanol feed to lipid molar ratio.

property catalyst_molfrac¶

Catalyst molar fraction in methanol feed.
